title: Deadly.Premonition.Director's.Cut.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Deadly.Premonition.Director's.Cut.Repack-R.G.Mechanics



Year: 2013
Genre: Action (Survival horror) / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Access Games
Publisher: Ignition Entertainment
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: PROPHET

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.0Ghz or equivalent
Memory: 2 GB
Video: 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹compatible with DirectX 9
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 6.5 GB

Description:

The protagonist - a secret agent, Francis Morgan, who was 
sent to investigate the brutal murder of a local beauty. 
Among the snow-capped mountains and cities populated by 
eccentric natives, Agent Morgan will have to unravel the 
mystery of these murders and to survive in a place populated 
by supernatural beings and homicidal maniacs who seek 
termination of the investigation once and for all.

Game Features:

Gripping story of the legendary game designer Hidetaka Suehiro.
Updated high-definition graphics worthy of the best examples of the genre.
Improved management, complemented with the wishes of the fans.

Repack Features

Deadly Premonition: The Director's Cut
Version of the game - v1.01b
Sewn crack text from ZoG Forum Team v0.9b
Ability to install DPfix'a v0.9.5
Do not cut / recoded
